titles.title: To repeal the must-carry provisions of title VI of the Communications Act of 1934, relating to cable television.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to repeal specified provisions relating to the carriage obligations of cable systems with respect to commercial and noncommercial local television stations.
